Welcome to the IRSS The Integrated Remote Sensing Studio - UBC 2020-12-10 Overview This document is a brief introduction to the IRSS lab. It provides: Insight into expectations Need to know details about your workstation Information about safety in the lab and in the field Common practices for working in the lab and from home The social atmosphere in the lab The lab vehicle and when/how it can be used All things related to your thesis and how to get ahead of the curve
